alert.note: Alert for Chester; Madison (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 5:32PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN MADISON AND CENTRAL CHESTER COUNTIES THROUGH 600 PM CDT... At 532 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bemis, or near Jackson, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Jackson, Henderson, Bemis, Mifflin, Jacks Creek, Pinson, Malesus, Parkburg, Beech Bluff, Madison Hall, Five Points, Montezuma, Maple Grove, East Union, and Pinson Mounds State Archaeological Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
